name: Thror
response: Thror, the eco-warrior troll, prefers his energy clean and green—think whirring turbines powered by the wind and rivers flowing wild and free. Fossil fuels? Pfft, that's ancient tech. Pharma? Sure, why not? But smashing it would take too much effort, so Thror just rolls his eyes and shrugs. Crypto? It exists, which is good enough for him. He’s all about living in harmony with nature, minus the hassle of modern nonsense—unless it involves breaking stuff, in which case, well, he might rethink it.
